about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of Detective Kevin Brooks and prepare for a nightmare you may never escape. LIMINAL FEAR is a horror experience designed to push you to the edge of insanity. This first-person horror game will make you question reality as you explore a world of relentless terror and psychological torment.

Set in 1999, in a luxurious yet decaying building in New York, the story unfolds over a single day that will become an eternity of horror for the protagonist.

Explore eerie environments in an atmosphere filled with tension. The game's immersive narrative weaves a web of moral dilemmas and dark secrets, ensuring that each step you take drags you deeper into an endless abyss. LIMINAL FEAR focuses on the terrifying sensation of being watched without your awareness, amplifying fear and anxiety with every movement.

LIMINAL FEAR is not just a game; it's a test of your bravery. Every moment is designed to make you suffer, instilling a profound sense of fear and panic. Are you ready to face your deepest nightmares and uncover the horrors lurking in the shadows? Your descent into madness begins now.

content_descriptors.notes: LIMINAL FEAR contains intense violence, blood, and gore. The game includes scenes of graphic horror and distressing content.

name: LIMINAL FEAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: LIMINAL FEAR: Are you ready for absolute terror? Step into the shoes of Detective Kevin Brooks, explore chilling environments, and uncover dark secrets that could change the world. You will be watched and hunted without realizing it... Your descent into madness begins now.

English*, Spanish - Spain
